sentences.en: By performing core displacement and micro pore model displacement experiments, the mechanism and changing law of saliferous reservoir parameters were studied.
sentences.cn: 通过岩心驱替以及砂岩微观孔隙模型驱替实验，研究了高含盐油藏水驱储层参数变化机理和规律。

sentences.en: Maoxing block saliferous strata are mainly in 4 th Member, Funing Formation , Eocene Series.
sentences.cn: 茅兴块段含盐系地层主要为始新统阜宁组四段.

sentences.en: Palisade tissue is rich in saliferous vacuoles, while vascular bundle sheath is obvious.
sentences.cn: 栅栏组织富含含盐液泡泡, 维管束鞘明显.

sentences.en: Palisade tissue is rich in saliferous vacuoles.
sentences.cn: 栅状组织富含含盐液泡。

sentences.en: There are various saliferous soils in circum-Bohai area. In road construction along the sea, the setting of subgrades is induced mainly by dissolution of salt in soils.
sentences.cn: 环渤海地区广泛分布各种类型的盐渍土，在沿海道路施工中，土中盐类的溶解是造成地基沉陷的主要原因。

sentences.en: Thin - walled cells of callow stirpe's cortex contain saliferous vacuoles, and pulp cells contain crystals. "
sentences.cn: 幼茎皮层薄壁细胞中含有含盐液泡泡, 髓细胞中含有晶体.

trans.tran_en: (esp of rock strata) containing or producing salt
